channel.title: r_flushlod Command Crashes Engine
channel.description:
This one isn't an issue for normal play, but can be pretty frustrating for devs. In the Steam edition of Black Mesa, the console command "r_flushlod" seems to crash the engine for some reason. It doesn't seem to always crash when used on the main menu, but while in-game (when useful) it does.
[url='https://www.dropbox.com/s/8ttltgt2rz6na0m/crash_bms.exe_20150531122323_1.dmp?dl=0']Here's a dump file if needed.[/url]

item.title: r_flushlod Command Crashes Engine
item.dc:creator: MatiasKiller21
item.description:
I said “Im checked the command & the studiorenderer.dll causes crash”

Read full topic

item.title: r_flushlod Command Crashes Engine
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Am I misunderstanding, or are you telling me that I and others I’ve had test it did something we have not?

item.title: r_flushlod Command Crashes Engine
item.dc:creator: MatiasKiller21
item.description:
Crypt:

Just crashes, w/ standard windows “exe stopped” error.

I checked and studiorenderer.dll file causes crash. You tried to put bms.exe to Windows XP SP3 compatibility.

Read full topic
